name: 10.17 "A Diminished Rebecca with a ..." Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What type of trophy did Woody have?
questions.explanation:
Golf.

	He told Frasier he got it at the trophy shop. Frasier asked him if he'd rather practice and earn it. Woody said that then he'd have a trophy (which he already owned).

Harry Connick, Jr.

	Harry Connick, Jr. was born September 11, 1967.  In 1992 he was charged with bringing a gun to airport security.

questions.text: What did Russell say Hanover, Indiana was?
options: Broken leg capital of the world
Smart people capital of the world
questions.explanation:
UFO capital of the world.

	Frasier wanted to see if all the stories Woody told were true. After hearing Russell, he believed it.

questions.text: Why did Russell come to Boston?
questions.correct: His girlfriend dumped him and he wanted to make a fresh start.
options: He really missed his cousin Woody.
He was too attached to his mother and needed to seperate from her.
He had legal trouble and had to get out of Indiana.
questions.explanation:
His girlfriend dumped him and he wanted to make a fresh start.

	Woody told the gang, "I think he's hoping to make the big time like me." Norm did not think Woody made the big time because he lived "hand-to-mouth". Woody said, "Yep, back home people think I made a pact with the devil."

The new uniform rule.

	Twitchell, another postman, reminded Cliff of the rule. Cliff said he wouldn't wear a new uniform.

questions.text: Who did Russell have a crush on first?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Sam said Russell was following Rebecca around asking to do things for her.  Rebecca thought it was sweet that Russell had a crush on her.

questions.text: What did Russell paint on the hotel wall above the bed?
questions.correct: A full picture of Rebecca Howe
questions.explanation:
A full picture of Rebecca Howe.

	She thought he had a little crush on her. It turned out he was completely obsessed with her.

questions.text: When Russell asked if Rebecca was coming in today, what did Sam say?
questions.correct: Well, she's scheduled to work, so I"m not really sure.
questions.explanation:
Well, she's scheduled to work, so I"m not really sure.

	The employees at Cheers had a tendency to show up and leave whenever they felt like it. There's also this joke that Rebecca didn't do anything anyway.

questions.text: When Rebecca went back to Russell's hotel, what did she find on the wall this time?
questions.correct: Carla's face painted over Rebecca's body
options: He had painted the wall blue over where the painting of Rebecca was
He had painted his own portrait instead
He had punched a hole in the wall where Rebecca's face was painted
questions.explanation:
Carla's face painted over Rebecca's body.

	Since Rebecca let him down he changed his obsession. He called Carla, "dreamy".

questions.text: Did Russell end up with any of the women that he had a crush on?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Rebecca was going to go out with him until she saw his new obsession for Carla. Carla, as of the end of the episode, didn't know he developed an obsession for her.
